objects.src: <svg width='1080' height='1080' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><defs><radialGradient id='bgGradient' cx='50%' cy='50%' r='70%'><stop offset='0%' stop-color='#FFF5F7'/><stop offset='100%' stop-color='#F8E1E5'/></radialGradient><filter id='softGlow' x='-50%' y='-50%' width='200%' height='200%'><feGaussianBlur in='SourceGraphic' stdDeviation='15' result='blur'/><feComposite in='SourceGraphic' in2='blur' operator='over'/></filter></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bgGradient)'/><g opacity='0.5'><path d='M0,300 Q540,250 1080,300 T1080,500 T0,700 T0,300' fill='#F9D0D9' opacity='0.3'/><path d='M0,400 Q540,350 1080,400 T1080,600 T0,800 T0,400' fill='#F7C0CF' opacity='0.2'/></g><g opacity='0.4' filter='url(#softGlow)'><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='5' fill='#FFD1DC'/><circle cx='300' cy='150' r='3' fill='#FFD1DC'/><circle cx='400' cy='250' r='4' fill='#FFD1DC'/><circle cx='500' cy='150' r='5' fill='#FFD1DC'/><circle cx='600' cy='200' r='3' fill='#FFD1DC'/><circle cx='700' cy='150' r='4' fill='#FFD1DC'/><circle cx='800' cy='250' r='5' fill='#FFD1DC'/><circle cx='900' cy='150' r='3' fill='#FFD1DC'/><circle cx='200' cy='800' r='5' fill='#FFD1DC'/><circle cx='300' cy='850' r='3' fill='#FFD1DC'/><circle cx='400' cy='800' r='4' fill='#FFD1DC'/><circle cx='500' cy='850' r='5' fill='#FFD1DC'/><circle cx='600' cy='800' r='3' fill='#FFD1DC'/><circle cx='700' cy='850' r='4' fill='#FFD1DC'/><circle cx='800' cy='800' r='5' fill='#FFD1DC'/><circle cx='900' cy='850' r='3' fill='#FFD1DC'/></g><g opacity='0.6'><path d='M-100,200 Q540,100 1180,200' stroke='#FADDE6' stroke-width='1' fill='none'/><path d='M-100,300 Q540,200 1180,300' stroke='#FADDE6' stroke-width='1' fill='none'/><path d='M-100,800 Q540,700 1180,800' stroke='#FADDE6' stroke-width='1' fill='none'/><path d='M-100,900 Q540,800 1180,900' stroke='#FADDE6' stroke-width='1' fill='none'/></g></svg>

objects.text:
Delicate open-ended design • Crystal pavé hearts • Rose gold-toned finish
Adjustable fit • Hypoallergenic • Perfect for special occasions

product_details.name: Elegant Crystal Heart Cuff Bracelet - Sparkling Romance Collection
product_details.description:
• Delicate open-ended cuff design for adjustable fit
• Premium quality crystal pavé heart embellishments
• Rose gold-toned finish for timeless elegance
• Lightweight and comfortable for everyday wear
• Perfect for special occasions and romantic gestures
• Dual crystal heart accents at both ends
• Hypoallergenic material suitable for sensitive skin
• Sophisticated minimalist style with glamorous details
• Makes an ideal gift for anniversaries, birthdays, or Valentine's Day
• Modern contemporary design suitable for all age groups

banner_details:
This banner features a delicate and romantic theme designed to highlight a jewelry product. The background uses a soft radial gradient transitioning from blush pink to a gentle rose tone with subtle abstract curves and dots, enhancing elegance. The header text (`heading`) is bold and centered at the top, instantly catching attention. Beneath it, a softer italic tagline (`tagline`) adds a poetic branding statement. The product image (`product_image`) is centered and prominent, showcasing the bracelet. A detailed product description (`description`) lists key features in a balanced dual-line layout. The price (`price`) appears bold in a standout font, followed by a call-to-action button (`cta_background` with `cta` text) that is clearly visible and inviting for the viewer to click.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Blush Pink: `#FFF5F7`
- Soft Rose: `#F8E1E5`
- Mauve Pink: `#C06C84`
- Deep Plum: `#6C5B7B`
- Classic Navy: `#355C7D`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek and elegant bracelet with heart-shaped ends encrusted with sparkling white rhinestones. The color palette prominently features metallic silver (#C0C0C0) for the bracelet’s base, blending seamlessly into soft rose-gold reflections (#F6D7C4), adding warmth and sophistication. The rhinestones sparkle in varying shades of white (#FFFFFF) and ice gray (#DCDCDC), creating a radiant focal point. Highlights on the metal reflect ambient light in a soft gradient that enhances the product’s shine. These colors blend smoothly while maintaining contrast through the sparkle of stones, making this palette ideal for a luxurious and feminine advertisement banner.
